articles.author: Siladitya Ray
articles.title: Tencent Shares Slide After Pentagon Blacklists Chinese Tech Giant - Forbes
articles.description: Tencent denied any links with the Chinese military and said the blacklisting was a mistake.
articles.content: Chinese internet giant Tencents shares slumped sharply on Tuesday after the company was added to a Pentagon blacklist for its alleged links with the Chinese military, prompting criticism from authori… [+3226 chars]
